loans.name: Sola

texts.en:
Sola is a 39-year-old mother with four children. She runs a small business of cooking rice and curry and sells the food in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year.

Sola requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, box of curry, box of chicken, sack of rice, bottle of vegetable oil, sack of potatoes, sack of onions, plastic bags, container, and a gas stove for her business.

She will use her profit to build a small restaurant in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, box of curry, box of chicken, sack of rice, bottle of vegetable oil, sack of potatoes, sack of onions, plastic bags, container, and a gas stove.

loans.name: Celinda

texts.es: La Señora Celinda de ocupación agricultora tiene varios años trabajando en el rubro no termino sus estudios porque desde muy joven se dedicó a trabajar a ayudar a sus padres solo curso la primaria la Sra. comenta que desde joven sufrió mucho ya que venía de una familia humilde y numerosa, tenía muchos hermanos los cuales tampoco terminaron sus estudios por falta de apoyo económico, comenta que su padre murió cuando era muy pequeña dejándolas solos y ella como ser la hermana mayor tubo que trabajar para ayudar a su madre para poder sacar adelante a sus hermanos hasta que crecieron y se hicieron responsables ellos solos y a los 38 años se casó con el Sr. Juan y tuvo dos hijos su deseo era tener más hijos pero su edad ya no le permitió tener más familia la razón por la que ella trabaja y quiere salir adelante para dejarles un mejor futuro y por esa razón ella apoya a sus hijos y tenga un mejor futuro, su sueño es que sus hijos entren a la universidad estudien una carrera y sean profesionales  hoy requiere del préstamo de dinero para la compra de semilla e insumos para la siembra de su terreno agrícola que es su fuente de trabajo y así poder cumplir todos sus objetivos familiares.
texts.en:
Celinda is a farmer with many years working in the field. She didn't finish school because from a very young age she began to work helping her parents. She only went to elementary school. She says that as a young girl she suffered a lot, as she came from a large, humble family. She had many siblings, who also dropped out of school due to lack of economic resources. She says that her father died when she was very young, leaving them alone. She, as the oldest sister, had to work to help her mother be able to move her siblings forward until they were older and could be responsible for themselves.

When she was 38 years old she married Juan, and they had two children. She wanted to have more, but her age precluded her from having more children. That's why she works. She wants to succeed in order to give her children a better future. For that reason she supports her children, to have a better future. Her dream is that her children go to college, study a career, and become professionals. Today she needs a loan to buy seeds and supplies to plant her agricultural terrain which is her source of work, in order to fulfill all her familial goals.

loans.use: to buy seeds and supplies to plant her agricultural terrain in order to achieve all her familial goals.

loans.name: Reinarose

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Reinarose works hard to support her family. She has a hardware store business in the Philippines, and also earns income from a general store.

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy materials like cement and other construction supplies for her hardware store business.

Reinarose has been sustaining her business activities through her past one loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to realize her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials like cement and other construction supplies for her business.

loans.name: Satipeños Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Satipeños Triunfadoras” está conformado por socios de la misma zona se conocen entre sí, responsables con distintas actividades comerciales y una de ellas es la Sra. Gina de 31 años, conviviente con dos hijos que son menores de edad. Años atrás Gina trabajaba como recepcionista de un Hotel de la zona pero al ver que descuidaba a su familia decide  abrir su propio negocio es así que actualmente  se dedica a por las tardes a la venta de dulces como (galletas, caramelos, frugos, chicles, ect.) en el parque de la ciudad. Una de las metas de Gina es que su hija siga sus estudios superiores. El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería de dulces (galletas, caramelos,  frugos, chicles, etc.). Gina es la persona que viste polo de color azul y pantalón color negro.
Se siente muy contenta de haber recibido el apoyo de parte de los inversionistas Kiva.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Satipeños Triunfadoras” is comprised of members from the same area. The members know each other, are responsible, and have different businesses. One of the members is Gina, 31, who lives with her two children who are minors.

Years ago, Gina worked as a receptionist at a hotel in the area, but after seeing that she was neglecting her family, she decided to open her own business. Thus, she currently sells snacks such as cookies, candy, fruit, gum, etc., in the city's park in the afternoon. One of Gina's goals is for her daughter to continue her studies.

The loan that Gina is requesting will be used to buy goods such as cookies, candy, fruit, gum, etc. In the photo, Gina is the one wearing a blue polo and black pants. She feels very happy about receiving support from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy goods such as cookies, candy, fruit, gum, etc.

loans.name: Merlin

texts.en: Merlin is 58 years old; she's married and has 2 children to provide.She has been selling fish for many years. With the help of her husband who do fishing, she were able to support the needs of her family. She want to earn more profit, and engage to other business activities. She join and gain access from GDMPC, and recently, she took a new loan to buy new fishing nets to catch more fish, and in order to sell plenty of fish in the market. Merlin's plan for the future is to save more money and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets to catch more fish

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is married and works hard to support her family. She has a Personal Collection products direct-selling business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more products from Personal Collection to sell.

Josephine has been in this business for 10 years now. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more products from Personal Collection to sell.

loans.name: Merle

texts.en:
Merle is 46 years old and married with four children. With three of her children currently in school, Merle works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like bread, snack foods, soft drinks, noodles, detergent, soap, etc. to sell.

Merle has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like bread, snack foods, soft drinks, noodles, detergent, soap, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Teofista

texts.en:
Teofista is 69 years old, and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and also earns an income from raising pigs.

She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like chocolate drinks, cereals, detergent, soap, canned goods, eggs, etc. to sell.

Teofista has borrowed and repaid 25 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items like chocolate drinks, cereals, detergent, soap, canned goods, eggs, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Sara Elizabeth

texts.es: Sara tiene 22 años es alegre y emprendedora, esta soltera vive con su madre, tres años atrás inicio a criar  pollos pequeños con el dinero que obtuvo como ganancia de las ventas volvió a invertir y pudo comprar el doble. Sara requiere este dinero para construir dos galpones, comprar pollos, alimento, medicamento para poder obtener mayores ingresos que puedan cubrir los gastos de alimentaciòn y vivienda de ella y su madre.
texts.en:
Sara is 22 years old. She is happy, enterprising, single and lives with her mother. Three years ago she started breeding small chickens. With the money that she earned from selling them, she invested again and was able to buy double the amount.

Sara needs this money to build chicken coops, buy chickens, feed and medicine in order to obtain a higher income that can cover her and her mother's food and home expenses.

loans.use: buy materials to build chicken coops.

loans.name: Elieta

texts.en:
Elieta is a 42-year-old mother with nine children. She owns and operates a small business of selling pancake, pork cake, and buns in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than three years.

Elieta requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a frying pan, to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to build a small bakery store in the near future. She joined SPBD in 2010.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a frying pan.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is 36 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and also earns an income from pig fattening.

She has requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of groceries to sell in her stall, such as milk, coffee, drinks, bread, canned goods, noodles, shampoo and other personal care products.

Analiza has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of groceries to sell in her stall, such as milk, coffee, drinks, bread, canned goods, noodles, shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул, 28 лет, замужем, есть сын. У Назгул среднее образование, занимается торговлей кондитерскими изделиями в собственном магазине. В обороте есть товар на сумму 200,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Назгул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение ассортимента и товарооборота в магазине. Доходы от кредита Назгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса и образование детей.
texts.en:
Nazgul is 28 years old, married, and has a son. Nazgul has secondary education, and sells confectionery in her own shop. There is 200,000 som (KGS) worth of goods in circulation. 

With the view of further developing her business, Nazgul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS), in order to increase the variety and turnover in her shop. Nazgul plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her business, and in her children's education.

loans.use: to increase turnover of confectionery in her shop.

loans.name: Orzijon

texts.ru: Орзижон успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав кредитные средства по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Благодаря упорному труду Орзижон, на сегодняшний день у нее имеется 0,70 ГА собственного земельного надела, на котором она ежегодно выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Также в хозяйстве есть 30 овец, 50 кур, 30 индюков и 15 уток. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,900 сом (KGS). Орзижон обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) для покупки 2 дойных коров для продажи экологически чистого молока. Доходы от кредита Орзижон хочет вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Orzijon has successfully repaid her loan, having used it as specified. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her with financing. Thanks to Orzijon's persistent hard work, today she owns a 0.70 plot of land, on which she cultivates corn every year for sales and on-farm use. The farm also has 30 sheep, 50 chickens, 30 turkeys, and 15 ducks. Her monthly income is 13,900 som (KGS). 

Orzijon has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 110,000 som (KGS) in order to buy two dairy cows so as to sell organic milk. Orzijon wants to invest the funds from the loan in the increase of her livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to sell organic milk.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
Al noroccidente de la Provincia de Pichincha se encuentra el Cantón San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del amor un lugar de clima cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora, el mismo es muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros a disfrutar de las maravillosas cascadas y hosterías en las que se pueden pasar un buen momento en familia o con amigos.
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio el señor Nelson un hombre luchador de 58 años él es casado de esta relación tienen 4 hijos pero solo 3 dependen de ellos ya que  están estudiando, Don Nelson trabaja como guardia, su esposa se encarga del negocio que es confección de toda clase de ropa deportiva, al mismo le dedican un promedio de 10 horas por día, vienen de una familia de bajos recursos económicos por lo que no pudieron continuar con sus estudios ellos solo tienen la primaria, solicitan el crédito para ampliar el negocio, compraran otra máquina ya que tienen mucha demanda en este negocio por su entrega puntual y buena atención a cliente. 
Con esta nueva inversión desean que sus ingresos mejoren y poder ayudar a sus hijos para que se preparen y tengan un buen futuro, el señor Nelson agradece a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
In the northwest of the Pichincha province, the San Miguel de los Bancos canton is found, the canton of love. It has a warm humid climate and is full of friendly, hardworking people. The canton is visited by national and foreign tourists to enjoy the wonderful waterfalls and hostels where you can have a good time with family or friends.

Nelson lives and has a business in this canton. He is a 58-year-old determined man who is married and has 4 children. Only 3 of them depend on him since they go to school. Nelson works as a guard. His wife is in charge of the business, which is sewing all kinds of sportswear. They devote an average of 10 hours a day to the business. They come from a low-income family so they couldn't continue studying past elementary school.

Nelson is requesting this loan to expand his business. He will buy another sewing machine since their business is in high demand because of their prompt delivery and good customer service. With this loan, he and his wife hope to increase their income in order to help their children so that they are prepared and can have a good future. Nelson is grateful to Kiva for their support and the opportunities provided.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and thus increase demand in order to educate his children.

loans.name: Gavharbi

texts.ru: Гавхарби 45 летняя жена и мать четверых детей. У нее 2 дочери 2 сыновья. Сыновья занимается мастером по ремонту домов. Старшая дочка учится в университете, а младшая учится в школе. Муж Гавхарби занимается мастером по ремонту автомашин. У Гавхарби дружная и трудолюбивая семья. Сама Гавхарби занимается шитьем женской одежды у себя дома на заказ. Вот уже 6 лет она продвигает свою работу. Ей нравится сшить и кроить. Старшая дочка Гавхарби учится в очном и договорном отделении. Ей надо оплатить на годового обучения дочери, но у Гавхарби нет такая сумма денег. Гавхарби решила взять кредит и оплатить на обучения дочери. Она с большими надеждами обратилась к Вам.
texts.en:
Gavharbi is a 45-year-old wife and mother of four children. She has two daughters and two sons. Her sons are home repair specialists. Her elder daughter is studying in university, and her younger daughter is still going to school. Gavharbi's husband is a vehicle repair specialist. 

Gavharbi has a friendly and hardworking family. Gavharbi works from home as a seamstress of made-to-order women's clothes. She has been in this line of work for 6 years. She likes to sew and cut. 

Gavharbi's older daughter is a full-time student. She needs to pay for her daughter's annual university fees, but Gavharbi does not have enough money. Gavharbi has decided to take a loan to pay for her daughter's education. She is appealing to you with great hopes.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.name: Adelicio

texts.es:
Adelicio con 29 años de edad,de estado civil casado,vive en casa propia de material rústico, junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos, en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú, en una zona rural. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican básicamente a la agricultura.

Adelicio se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de cafeto, de la variedad Catimor,con una experiencia en el rubro hace 15 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a cría y venta de ganado vacuno y cultivo de productos de pan llevar.Solicita préstamo para el mantenimiento de dicho cultivo, con ello obtendrá buen rendimiento y mayores ingresos para  así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Adelicio es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.Firma sólo.
texts.en:
Adelicio is 29 years old and lives in his own house made of rustic materials, together with his wife and three children.  They live in the district of Santo Tomás, in the province of Cutervo, in the department of Cajamarca, in Perú, a rural area.  The people of this town mainly make their living through agriculture.

Adelicio makes his living in agriculture, specifically the cultivation of coffee trees, specifically Catimor variety.  He has been engaged in this sector for 15 years. Additionally he is engaged in raising and selling cattle and in the cultivation of staple crops.  He is requesting a loan for the maintenance of his crops, so that he can obtain good yield and higher income in order to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

Adelicio is a repeat borrower for the financial institution Edpyme Alternativa.  He signs alone.

loans.use: para el mantenimiento de dicho cultivo,

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
Carlos Antonio con 61 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive junto a su cónyuge, en casa propia, en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú, en una zona rural. Carlos Antonio cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.

Carlos Antonio se dedica a brindar servicio de albañilería; con una experiencia en el rubro de 20 años ,su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio.Solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo,compra de herramientas como son tablas, burros, etc, para su trabajo, esto con la finalidad de brindar mejores servicio.

Carlos Antonio es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Carlos Antonio is 61 years old and is in a common law marriage. He lives with his partner in a house he owns in a rural zone in the Oyotún district, in the province of Chiclayo, in the department of Lambayeque, Perú. Carlos Antonio has very good references, both personal and work, from the inhabitants of the area.

Carlos Antonio works as a mason. With 20 years experience, his work is located at his home. He seeks a loan to invest in fixed assets and the purchase of tools such as planks, sawhorses, etc. for his work, with the goal of providing better services.

Carlos Antonio is a recurring client for Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to invest in fixed assets and the purchase of tools such as planks, sawhorses, etc. for his work.

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en:
Maricar is 34-years-old, from the province of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Noriel, a sales coordinator. Maricar helps her husband to make a living and save for their future kids. As someone who loves sweets, she decided to make delicacies and pastries for additional income. 

Maricar makes pastries such as "pastillas" (sweet milk candies), "yema" (chewy candy made from condensed milk and egg yolks), yema cakes, cookies, and chocolates. She sells them at her house to her neighbors, friends and relatives. 

She is requesting for a 15,000 PHP loan to pay for cooking utensils and ingredients, such as flour, condensed milk, egg yolks, sugar, butter, cocoa powder and chocolate bits to make her delicacies.

Maricar dreams of having her own delicacies shop someday and living a blessed life. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work, and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies .

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for cooking utensils and ingredient to make delicacies to sell

loans.name: Aution Business Group

texts.en:
Isatu is a 33-year-old businesswoman. She is a member of Auction Business Solidarity group. Auction Business Solidarity group has 4 members (see group picture, Isatu is in the far right).

Seven years ago Isatu established her cosmetics business to support her child's education. She pays school fees, buys learning materials and provides food for her child. She opens her business six days in a week from 9am to 6pm. 

Auction Business Group needs a total loan of 4,800,000 SLL. Isatu is entitled to 1,200,000 SLL which she will use to buy additional cosmetics for her business. She hopes that this loan will help her generate more profit to support her family. Isatu is married with one child aged thirteen and a school going child.

In the future, Isatu plans to save more money to provide for her child’s university education. She believes educating her child to university level will better the lives of her family. Isatu and the rest of the group members thank you for your support.

loans.use: to buy additional cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 66 years old, is married and has seven children.

Teresita is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Teresita requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Teresita has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Teresita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Ma. Suzette

texts.en:
Ma. Suzette is a 32-year-old married woman with four children, who are all in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a public utility vehicle business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business.

Ma. Suzette has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SANTA ROSA DE URUBAMBA.
La socia Leonarda tiene 56 años de edad y es viuda, la socia  alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a trabajar en una empresa privada, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de víveres para su hogar como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the SANTA ROSA DE URUBAMBA communal bank.

Leonarda is 56 years old and is a widow. She alternates her daily activities, working for a private company. She has been working at her job for some time, and it is going well thanks to the determination that she brings to her work every day. She would like to continue working like this, in order to support her family.

Leonardo is requesting a loan to buy provisions for her household such as rice, sugar, milk and other things.

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy provisions for her household, such as rice, sugar, milk and other things.

loans.name: Petra

texts.en:
Petra has switched from selling snacks to selling dried fish. Her business is doing well when she doubles her time perfecting her own dried fish-making. She sells her products around her neighborhood.

With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family. The reason why she accessed another loan from PMPC is to buy more kilos of fish for her dried fish business.

Today, Petra is able to help others do a retailing business of her dried fish, and they as well earn for their own family.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of fish for her dried fish business.

loans.name: Neri

texts.es:
Neri con 33 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos, en casa propia de material rústico, en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia Jaen, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú. Neri tiene 8 años radicando en la zona, tiene muy buena referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad.

Neri se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, ubicado en el Caserio Sondor - Pomahauca, con una experiencia en el rubro de 8 años, el préstamo que se le otorgara , lo utilizara en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes y en mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.

Neri es socia recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Firma con junto a su cónyugue.
texts.en:
Neri, 33 years old, lives with her husband and children, in their own house made of rustic materials, in the district of Pomahuaca, Jaen province, Cajamarca department, in the country of Peru. Neri has lived in the zone 8 years, she has very good personal and work references in her community.

Neri works in agriculture, specifically in growing coffee, located in the village of Sondor - Pomahuaca, with 8 years of experience in the field. The loan that is granted to her will be used to pay for agricultural work, applying and using phytosanitary products and fertilizers and to pay labor costs for her harvest. In this way it will help her in the physiological, morphological and productive improvement of her crop, and also to have a good harvest, and in the end she will have more production and a better quality product which she will not have problems selling.

Neri is a repeat borrower for Edpyme Alternativa. She co-signs with her spouse.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural work, applying and using phytosanitary products and fertilizers.

loans.name: Eligio

texts.en: Eligio makes a good earning on his farming activities in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. He is known as a grower of rice, corn and various vegetables and fruits. This is how he supports his family and is able to send his children to school. Eligio had acquired an additional parcel of land that he bought through his savings of profit. He approached Paglaum to ask for a loan to pay for the processing fee in the transfer of land title of acquired property.

loans.use: to pay for processing fee in the transfer of land title of acquired property

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional goods to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Aurelia dreams that one day, She will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell.

loans.name: Sherdil

texts.en: Sherdil is studying Business Administration. Sherdil is from a single-parent family. His parents divorced when he was three years old and his father left for Russia. He lives with his mother and tries to support her in everything. His mother has great expectations on him and always tried to give him the best education what she could afford herself. Sherdil finished the Aga Khan Lyceum in Tajikistan, a school which makes all students to strive to be knowledgeable and makes them ambitious in order to be good contributors for development of Tajikistan. He is a competent person to study at the best universities of the world, so made up his mind to study at AUCA, because it is one of the leading contemporary universities in Central Asia and inspires its students to broaden their perspectives of the future. To achieve his goals, Sherdil had to move to Kyrgyzstan and rent a flat with his group mates. It is hard for his mother to pay for his tuition fee and cover all his travel expenses to the university,  that she is applying for Kiva loan asking to support his son. Moving to another country to get a higher education is hard not just financially, but also morally and culturally. Of course, Sherdil is a strong person to go through these difficulties just to bring more prosperity and changes for his community. Unfortunately, there are some problems which can’t be solved by him and waiting for the Kiva lenders attention and help.

loans.use: to pay for his higher education in BA Program

loans.name: Cholponai

texts.ru: Чолпонай, 45 лет, в разводе, мать 2 детей. У Чолпонай высшее образование, работает воспитателем в детском саду, также занимается животноводством. У нее развитое хозяйство, есть 30 овец, на земельном наделе выращивает корма для животных. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 18,000 сом (KGS). Этих средств не хватает на содержание семьи и достойное воспитание детей. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпонай обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья, также удобрений для полеводства. Доходы Чолпонай планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и обучение ее детей.
texts.en:
Cholponai is 45 years old, divorced, and has two children. Cholponai has higher education, works as a kindergarten teacher, and also breeds livestock. She has a developed farm with 30 sheep, and she cultivates feed for the animals on a land plot. Her total monthly income is about 18,000 som (KGS). These funds are not enough to support her family and adequately provide for her children. 

With the view of further developing her business, Cholponai has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock for increasing her herd, and also to buy fertilisers for growing crops. Cholponai plans to invest the funds in the further development of her business, and in her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase some livestock and fertilizers for land cultivation in order to icrease her income.

loans.name: Vilma Estela

texts.es: Doña Vilma de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus padres y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace mas de 20 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia pero tambien vende de manera ambulante a los empleados de una empresa privada, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas materia prima arroz, pollos, carne, frijoles, fruta, verduras, etc. y asi poder variar su menu de comida para tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Misses Vilma, 51 years of age, lives in her own house with her parents and her son.  She has sold food for a living for over 20 years.  Her business is located in her place of residence, but she also peddles on foot to the employees of a private company.  With what she obtains from her sales, she is able to settle her home's expenses.  She is seeking a loan to purchase more raw materials: rice, chickens, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc., and in this way enable herself to vary her food menu to have better economic income.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials: rice, chickens, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Dúo En Dios Confiamos Group

texts.es: Dúo En Dios Confiamos: este Grupo esta conformado por la señora Rosa es originaria de San Martin Jilotepeque,ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos y lo vende a un mejor precio,tiene ya varios créditos obtenidos y les agradece por su ayuda, en esta ocasión ella esta solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos, esperando que le puedan ayudar para que siga adelante con su negocio.
texts.en:
En Dios Confiamos [In God We Trust] Duo

Rosa, originally form San Martin Jilotepeque, is a member of this group. She is 29 years old. Her work is making and selling woven tapestries, which she sells for a good price. She has received several loans and wants to thank you for your help.

This time, she is requesting a loan to buy raw material for her woven tapestries. She is hoping to receive help to get ahead with her business.

loans.use: to buy raw material for her woven tapestry business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Roy

texts.es:
Roy con 30 años de edad,de estado civil casado,vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Roy se dedica a prestar servicios como músico guitarrista, cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en el rubro. El préstamos solicitado lo utilizará para la compra de instrumentos. El crédito a otorgarle le facilitará obtener un ingreso adicional a su unidad familiar.

Roy si cuenta con experiencia crediticia, es socio reactivado en nuestra institución financiera.
texts.en:
Roy is 30 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department in the country of Peru. The majority of the people who live in this area engage in farming, livestock-raising, and run small businesses.

Roy works as a musician, playing the guitar. He has more than 5 years experience in this line of work. He will use the requested loan to instruments. The loan he has been granted will enable him to obtain an additional income for his family.

Roy has a good credit history and is a repeat client at the institution.

loans.use: to buy instruments

loans.name: Jessie

texts.en:
Jessie is 56 years old and married with four children. He is a very hard working entrepreneur.

He sells dried fish in the Philippines and has been in business for the past nine years. Jessie successfully repaid his previous loan and has now requested a PHP 30,000 loan, through NWTF, to purchase more dried fish to sell.

In the future, Jessie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una joven emprendedora madre de familia que actualmente labora y colabora en el sustento familiar, padece de  problemas dentales ya que algunos de sus piezas presentan problemas de desgaste por lo cual requiere atención y un tratamiento de endodoncia. Sin embargo sus recursos económicos no le alcanzan para solventar dicho tratamiento
texts.en: This young borrower is an enterprising mother who currently works and contributes to the support of her family.  She suffers from dental problems, because some of her teeth have erosion problems that need attention and endodontal treatment.  However, she lacks the resources to pay for this treatment.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for dental treatment

loans.name: Carino Group

texts.en:
Quetzaltenango, the second largest city in Guatemala, is 124 miles from the capital in the high mountains of the Western Highlands. It is a busy industrious city with many neighborhoods. One of these is the home of the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Cariño” (Dearest One). The nine women who make up the group are about to begin their third loan cycle with KIVA investors. These very spirited and hardworking women are grateful to KIVA for helping them grow their small businesses which helps them support their children’s education. Each one knows that a good education will help their children have a more brighter and successful future.

Elvira is 38 years old with six children and wants them to have a good education because she was unable to attend a single year of grade school. In spite of her lack of formal education, Elvira is intelligent and resourceful and looking for different strategies to increase the productivity of her produce and animal husbandry business. Right now she is growing beans and broccoli. Elvira wants to expand the cultivation of the beans and broccoli because they are quite popular in her area. She also wants to buy a bull to sell. These additions will increase her profits.

Elvira is very grateful to the generous KIVA investors who have helped her and the 22,000 other Friendship Bridge clients have a better and brighter future. Thank you!!!

loans.use: To purchase cabbage, broccoli and carrot seeds, and to purchase a bull to sell.

loans.name: Dúo Hombres De Valor Group

texts.es: Dúo Hombres de Valor Don Ddgar es el señor de camisa roja es soltero tiene 1 hija es  dueño de la panadería llamada panadería el colocho el inicio su negocio por la falta de empleo pobremente pero cada vez tenía más clientela  sus clientes son personas de su alrededor y de otros lugares aledaños él solicita el crédito para comprar harinas, aceite, manteca, y para poder remodelar ya que cada vez es más el trabajo y necesita una área  más  amplia sus metas son: mejorar su calidad de vida, hacer crecer el negocio, pagar los gastos de su casa, ofrecer variedad de productos y poder darle una mejor vida a su hija es el 2 crédito que solicita a fape . Y agradece la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Edgar, the man in the red shirt, is a member of the "Duo Hombres de Valor" communal bank.  He is single and has a daughter.  He owns a bakery called "Panaderia el Colocho."  He started this business because he lacked employment.  He began poorly, but over time he attracted more and more customers from his neighborhood and from surrounding areas.  

Edgar is requesting a loan to buy flour, cooking oil, and butter, and to remodel his business, because over time he has more and more work and he needs a bigger work space.  His goals are: to improve his quality of life, to grow his business, to pay his household expenses, to offer a greater variety of products for sale, and to provide his daughter with a better life.  This is the 2nd loan he has taken with FAPE, and he is grateful for the help that he is receiving.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make bread to sell

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señorita María del Carmen es una joven de 26 años de edad, se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir para mujeres y hombres, contando con sus propias herramientas de trabajo y de conocimiento en el rubro ya que cuenta con certificados de capacitación de cursos realizados como técnico medio en el rubro que se dedica actualmente. La señorita cuenta con buenas expectativas ya que a ella lo que más le motiva es salir adelante y con varias metas por realizar ya que ella es soltera y quiere llegar a formar un capital de trabajo que le pueda brindar más estabilidad a la marca de ropa que fabrica, para así posicionarse de mejor manera en el mercado.
La señorita viene de una familia trabajadora la cual esta inculcada con los valores de humildad, buena administración de recursos, respeto, con una visión de emprendimiento y alcanzar los objetivos que ella misma se traza a lo largo de su carrera técnica.
texts.en:
Maria Carmen is a 26 year-old youth who makes garments for men and women.  She has her own work tools and knowledge in this line of work, as she has certificates from completing mid-technical level coursework in dressmaking.  She has good expectations, because she is motivated to get ahead and has a number of goals to reach.  She is single, and wants to save up working capital so that she can have more stability in the brand of clothing that she makes.  This way, she can better position herself in the market.

Maria Carmen comes from a hardworking family that inculcated in her the values of humility, the good management of resources, respect, and an enterprising vision to reach the goals that she has plotted for her career.

loans.use: to buy supplies and materials to make garments

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en:
Vicenta is 52 years old and married with one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of groceries to sell at her stall including milk, coffee, drinks, bread, canned good, noodles, shampoo and other personal care products.

Vicenta has borrowed and re-paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from a buy-and-sell recycled materials business.

Vicenta aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of groceries to sell at her stall including milk, coffee, drinks, bread, canned good, noodles, shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Wenifreda

texts.en:
Wenifreda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Wenifreda requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Wenifreda has been in this business for 35 years now.

In the future, Wenifreda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 51 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, home product care, and other groceries.

Gemma has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from a buy-and-sell gasoline business.

Gemma aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, home product care, and other groceries.

loans.name: Rochie

texts.en:
Rochie is a hardworking female entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Rochie dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna, 40, is a married woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Edna has a food vending business in the Philippines and has been in business for 3 years. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, cooking oil, sugar, bamboo sticks and other materials needed for her food production business.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, spices, cooking oil, sugar, bamboo sticks and other materials needed for her food production business.

loans.name: Teresa Vicenta

texts.es: Doña Teresa de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, el se dedica a la comercialización de dulces tipicos al menudeo desde hace 25 años de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos ha tomado la decisión de ampliar su negocio de dulces y así poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de variedad de dulces  tipicos al por mayor y así aumentar sus ventas e ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Teresa is fifty-six years old and lives in her own home with her husband and her son. She has worked marketing and selling traditional sweets for twenty-five years. She has earned her living and supported the well-being of her household this way. With the goal of increasing her income, she has decided to expand her sweets business and improve the living conditions of her family.

In order to achieve this, she’s asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in buying a variety of traditional sweets in bulk. This way, she can increase her sales and income and be able to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of traditional sweets in bulk.

loans.name: Frida

texts.es: La señora Frida tiene 35 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos dependientes de sus ingresos, es una persona muy responsable, amable, humilde, respetuosa en su comunidad donde trabaja, como madre quiere lo mejor para su familia, con las iniciativas de seguir adelante, superarse y mejorar la situación económica de su familia. La señora Frida tiene un deseo para salir adelante, gracias a la capacitación a nivel técnico básico de confección de ropa típica, estos cursos se realizaron bajo el convenio de Fautapo, que son instituciones que brindan capacitaciones y apoyo a emprendedores. por las características mencionadas en la formación de la señora invertirá en la compra de maquinas para iniciar su actividad de confección de ropas y así ofrecer al mercado sus productos. actualmente se dedica a la agricultura produce cebolla, papa, arveja, vaina aprendió desde su niñez sobre la agricultura por la afluencia de sus progenitores en este rubro.
texts.en:
Frida is thirty-five years and has three children who depend on her income. She’s a very responsible, friendly, humble person. She’s respected in the community where she works for being a mother who wants the best for her family and as someone who has the initiative to move forward, overcome, and improve her family’s economic situation. Frida wants to get ahead, and is thankful for her training in basic clothes making. She learned through Fautapo, which is a foundation that gives training and support to entrepreneurs.

Because of her training, Frida wants to invest in buying machines to begin her clothes making business and offer her products on the market. Currently, she works in agriculture producing onions, potatoes, and peas. It’s something that she learned in her childhood from her parents in the area.

loans.use: to buy machines to start her business making ready to wear clothing, offer her products on the market, and create savings for her family.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La señora Margarita es una persona trabajadora de 45 años de edad, es de estado civil casada, alcanzo a estudiar hasta la primaria, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, es de construcción rustica con material local que tiene paredes de adobe y el techo con teja, se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad de Chaqui Kocha - Tiraque, su actividad económica es la agrícola en tal sentido produce;  papa, haba en vaina verde, arveja en vaina verde y avena 80 calchas (forraje) todos los productos mencionados son cultivados aproximadamente en una superficie de 2 has. los cuales cuentan con riego, ya que es aplicado por inundación, en ese sentido el cliente se ve con una necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar abono orgánico (gallinaza), con la producción en el futuro, con la intención de mejorar  sus ingresos y al mismo tiempo mejorara, una mejor vivencia familiar.
texts.en:
Señora Margarita is a hardworking 45-year-old woman. She is married, and studied up until elementary school. She is financially responsible for three people, and she lives in her own home. Her home is made of local rustic materials with walls of adobe and a tile roof. It is located in the neighborhood of Chaqui Kocha - Tiraque.

She makes a living in agriculture and she grows potatoes, green beans, sweet peas, and oats, 80 stacks (fodder) in total. She grows all of her crops in an area of approximately 2 hectares, which is irrigated by flooding.

With all of this in mind, Margarita sees the necessity of requesting a loan to be able to buy organic fertilizer (farmyard manure). Counting on future production, her goal is to improve her income and at the same time improve her family's way of life.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer so that her production improves, with the goal of increasing her income and at the same time improving her family's way of life.

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is 50 years old and married with five children, one child still in school, Rosela works very hard to provide for them.

Rosela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, drinks coffee, spices, noodles, snack foods and etc.

Rosela has been in this business for 1 year.

In the future Rosela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, milk, drinks, coffee, spices, noodles, snack foods, etc.

loans.name: Lilian Maribel

texts.es:
Lilian es una mujer de 38 años de edad, es casada con cuatro hijos dos de ellos están estudiando, uno el mayor cursa primero básico y el otro quinto primaria, esta querida familia vive en una comunidad de la aldea la ladrillera.
Lilian es una gran mujer que todos los días se esfuerza para  obtener algo de ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, ella desde hace tres años se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes, este negocio se ubica en su casa de habitación.
Lilian han tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de piso cerámico para mejorar el ambiente de su casa, pues aunque hace mucho tiempo ha buscado hacerlo no le ha sido posible, por esa razón opta por el préstamo. Su esperanza de vida es fortalecer su negocio, terminar la construcción de casa que está haciendo.
texts.en:
Lilian is a 38 year old woman. She is married and has four children, two of whom are still in school. One is in seventh grade and the other in fifth grade. This loving family lives in a community in the town of Ladrillera. Lilian is a wonderful woman who strives every day to obtain some income and help her husband with the household expenses. For three years she has worked buying and selling groceries. This business is located in her home.

Lilian has made the decision to seek a loan to buy ceramic flooring to improve the environment of her house. For a long time she has looked for a way to do this, but it hasn't been possible. For that reason she decided on the loan. Her hope in life is to strengthen her business, and finish construction of the house she is building.

loans.use: to buy ceramic flooring for her house.

loans.name: Silafaga

texts.en:
A loan amount of $1000 will help Silafaga to buy taro roots, banana tubes, a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, and hand gloves.

She is 23 years old with one child. Her business is selling taro and bananas to earn a living. She joined SPBD in 2015. Silafaga will expand her business using her profit.

loans.use: to buy taro roots, banana tubes, a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, and hand gloves,.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is 35 years old and married with two children. She lives in Carmen Annex, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental.

She owns and her husband operates a motorcycle transport business in the local community to earn a living. She has been with her business for over five years and earns 5,000 PHP every month.

She has been with GDMPC since 2009 and is now requesting a loan of 2,000 PHP to repair and purchase spare parts. She dreams to help her children complete their education.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance.

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La Señora Elizabeth actualmente  vive en el Departamento de La Paz en la provincia Aroma  Municipio de Sica sica, desde muy joven se dedicó a la agricultura  ayudando a sus padres  tiene un nivel de instrucción primario por motivos económicos no alcanzo a terminar el colegio ya que no contaba con el apoyo de sus padres, actualmente es de estado civil concubina su esposo que también se dedica a la agricultura pero esta actividad genera ingresos limitados cuenta con dos dependientes  un hijo de 2 años y el otro aún tiene solo meses de nacido la señora desde hace unos meses alcanzo a comprar una máquina de tejer y se dedicó a la venta de prendas de lana que ella misma las elabora el año 2007 realizo el curso de confección de polleras y enaguas para Cholitas que se llevó a cabo en la Localidad de Lahuachaca  de Julio a Noviembre como también realizo un curso de Tejido a máquina elabora prendas de Niños como Busitos Mallitas de lana  para niños los vende en las  ferias de las localidades vecinas no cuenta con puesto fijo vende su mercadería como vendedora ambulante sus ventas son mínimas por lo que solicita el préstamo para la compra de más máquinas de tejer (Doble) como también de costura para la elaboración de polleras  y enaguas para cholitas este préstamo le  será de gran ayuda para la señora ya que será un capital semilla para agrandar su propio negocio, incrementar sus ingresos y de esa manera mejorar su calidad de vida  de ella y su familia. La señora aparenta ser una persona honesta trabajadora muy emprendedora.
texts.en:
Señora Elizabeth lives in the La Paz area, in the Aroma province in the Sica Sica community. She has made a living in agriculture helping her parents since she was very young. She has an elementary school education. For financial reasons, she didn't finish high school since she didn't have the support of her parents. She is currently a concubine in civil status, and her partner also makes a living in agriculture. However, the income for this type of work is limited. She has two dependents, a 2-year-old son and another who is only months old.

Señora Elizabeth managed to buy a weaving machine a few months ago, and she has made a living selling article of wool clothing that she makes herself. In 2007, she took a course on how to make traditional multi-colored skirts and underskirts for Bolivian women, which took place in the city of Lahuachaca from July to November. She also took a course on weaving machines.

She makes articles of clothing for children such as leggings made of wool. She sells them in marketplaces in neighboring cities. She doesn't have a store from which she sells, so she sells her products traveling from place to place in the street. She doesn't sell much, and for this reason she is requesting a loan to buy more weaving machines (double) as well as sewing machines to make traditional multi-colored skirts and underskirts for Bolivian women.

This loan will be a great help to Señora Elizabeth, since it will be seed capital to enlarge her business, increase her income, and improve the quality of life for her and her family. Señora Elizabeth is an honest, hardworking, and very entrepreneurial woman.

loans.use: to buy weaving machines (double) to make traditional multi-colored skirts and underskirts for Bolivian women, and to grow her business and earn more income for her family.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn lives a simple life with her family in a town of Tubigon, Bohol. She is 62 years old and a married woman.

Jocelyn and her husband earn a living by the fishing business. They have been doing this for 12 years and earn about PHP 6,000 per month.

They want to enhance their business, especially Improving their earnings to have enough money to improve their house. Perhaps Jocelyn wants to renovate their house to have a comfortable living.

That is why she is asking for a loan for boat repair and to buy a fishing rod and fishing bait in order to enhance their catch to improve their sales.

loans.use: to do boat repair and to buy a fishing rod and fishing bait.

loans.name: Ramonita

texts.en:
Ramonita is 58 years old and widowed with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for 17 years and sells a variety of items such as noodles, sugar, sardines, spices, and other groceries.

In the future Ramonita would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Patron Salvador Del Mundo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “PATRON SALVADOR DEL MUNDO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de San Salvador, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Mery, la socia continua con su  negocio de venta y crianza de animales, la socia lleva  buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, a la vez la socia continua dedicándose a la  agricultura, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y alimentos para los mismos.
Los socios en general agradecen el crédito otorgado  y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These people are members of the communal bank “PATRON SALVADOR DEL MUNDO”. This bank is located in the district of San Salvador, belonging to the province of Calca in the city of Cusco.

The highlighted member is Sra. Mery. She has a business raising and selling animals. She has had her business for awhile now, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort and determination she puts towards her business everyday. At the same time, this member also makes a living in agriculture. She is a responsible and determined person.

She would like to be able to continue working so that she can continue to support her family. She is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs and feed for them.

All of the members are grateful for the loan to be granted, and are committed to fulfilling the loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and feed for them.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en:
Clara and her husband earn a living by selling firewood. They have been doing this for three years, and they hope for another successful year to continue operating this business to help them raise their children.

Clara wishes to have enough money to send her children to school so they could finish their studies and become professionals someday. That is why she works hard with her husband to improve their livelihood.

Thus, she is asking for a loan for additional capital to buy wood. Definitely, she will use the wood in making firewood to sell. Additionally, 54-year-old Clara lives with her family in Calape, Bohol.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Jakelyn

texts.en:
Jakelyn is 29 years old and single with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of groceries to sell her stall such as milk, coffee, drinks, bread, canned goods, noodles, shampoo, and personal care products.

Jakelyn has been in this business for two years. In the future she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of groceries to sell in her stall such as milk, coffee, drinks, bread, canned goods, noodles, shampoo, and personal care products.

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
Lea is a 37-year-old married woman. She lives in the area of Talibon, Bohol.

She has been selling rtw (ready-to-wear) for five years and she is helping her husband to feed her entire family. Aside from operating a rtw business, she also sells purchase order (p.o. ) cards. It is the purchase equivalent to cash and it will be due afterwards.

Her income in selling footwear, like sandals, shoes, bags, and household items is on the rise. The only problem is the capital to finance it. With these, she could able to cater the demands of her respective customers and also prevent the store from running out of stock.

Lea is asking for a loan to purchase additional purchase order ( p.o.) cards and stocks of rtw (ready-to-wear) demands. She can use the profit amount as savings to fulfill the future needs as well.

loans.use: to purchase an additional purchase order (p.o.) card and stocks of  rtw (ready-to-wear).

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Helen works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell cellphone business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Helen is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy more cellphone units to sell.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past one loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more cellphone units to sell.

loans.name: Inocencia

texts.en:
Inocencia is 31 years old. married, and has four children who are in school.Inocencia is married and has four children .

She is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Inocencia has been raising livestock for four years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Inocencia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 67 years old and married.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs.

Teresita has been raising pigs for 15 years now, and has borrowed 27 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer casada con una hermosa familia de cinco hijos de las edades entre 9 y 21 años de edad, esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de caserío paseyeneba.
Catarina es un apersona con grandes aspiraciones en la vida y con el afán de prosperar con su familia desde hace ocho años se dedica a la venta de banano y café, este negocio se ubica en la comodidad de su hogar.  Catarina con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una cuerda de terreno para cultivo de café y banano, esto con el objetivo de producir ella misma los productos para su negocio.
Su vida con el préstamo será beneficiado pues contara con un lugar donde poder producir y en un futuro sus hijos lo heredaran. Sus aspiraciones en la vida comprar más terreno para incrementar su cultivo, brindarles educación a sus hijos y cubrir mejor los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Catarina is a married woman with a beautiful family. She has five children between the ages of 9 and 21. This lovely family lives in the neighborhood of caserío paseyeneba.

Catarina is a person with great aspirations for her life. Motivated by the hope of prosperity for her family, she has made a living selling bananas and coffee for eight years. She runs this business out of the comfort of her own home.

With a desire to improve her living conditions, Catarina has decided to request a loan to buy an acre of land to grow coffee and bananas. This way, she will produce what she is selling in her business.

This loan will benefit her by providing her with a place where she will be able to grow, and her children will inherit this in the future. Her aspirations in life are to buy more land to increase her cultivation, give her children an education, and better take care of the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy an acre of land to grow bananas and coffee.

loans.name: Kadiatou's Group

texts.fr:
Créé le 12  Novembre 2011, à l’inauguration du dit banc villageois, ce groupe est composé de femmes qui ont une expérience dans le programme des bancs villageois. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et partageant des liens forts de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Kadiatou (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée ; mère de 05 enfants. Son activité consiste à acheter des poussins, les engraissés pour les revendre en détails

Avec son nouveau crédit, elle compte acheter des poussins d’un montant de 100000f, acheter des aliments d’un montant de 55000f payer une électricité de 35000f et un transport de 10000f pour le revendre en détails dans le marché local.

Les bénéfices, elle compte prendre en charge ses enfants : soins médicaux, habillements et aider son mari dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
Created on November 12th 2011, with the help of the village bank, this group is made up of women who all have experience in the village bank's program. They all are from the same village, share strong bonds of solidarity and help each other. Their primary activity is small business.

Mrs. Kadiatou (sitting down at the far right with her hand raised) is the star borrower of the group. She is married and the mother of 5 children. Her activity consists of buying young chickens and fattening them to resell them. With her new credit, she hopes to buy chickens for 100,000F and food products for 55,000 to resell at the local market and to pay for electricity for 35,000F and for transportation for 10,000F.

The earnings that she hopes to make will go towards her children: providing for their medical care, clothing and helping her husband to manage the daily household costs.

loans.use: to buy young chickens for 100,000F, to buy food products for 55,000F, to pay for electricity at 35,000F and to pay for transportation for 10,000F

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Fidel desea seguir trabajando cultivando granos básicos por lo que hace una nueva solicitud para un financiamiento que invertirá en abono, fertilizantes e insecticidas para realizar la siembra de esta temporada.
Agradece mucho el apoyo a través de los créditos que la institución le ha brindado, sus cosechas son abundantes, tiene mayores ganancias y su familia se encuentra en óptimas condiciones, por el momento no tiene dificultades para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Fidel would like to continue cultivating basic grains and to do so he requests a new loan, which he will invest in manure, fertilizers and insecticides for planting this season. 

He greatly appreciates the support of the loans that the institution has offered. His harvests are abundant. He has more income, and his family finds itself in optimum conditions. For now, he has no difficulties continuing to work.

loans.use: to invest in manure, fertilizers and insecticides for planting this season.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
Pedro es un padre de familia de 36 años de edad, es casado con grandes aspiraciones en la vida, tiene una hermosa familia de siete hijos de las edades entre 3 y 15 años, ellos viven en una comunidad  del caserío chitzanchaj.
Pedro (el primero del lado izquierdo de la fotografía)  es uno de los grandes hombres que trabajan día a día bajo el radiante sol, con el afán de llevar el pan de cada día a sus familia, tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la agricultura sembrando una variedad de verduras que la zona donde él vive produce, pero su otra actividad es la venta de verduras. 
Pedro es un hombre con mucha amabilidad y solidario que ahora junto a un grupo de personas que tienen la misma necesidad él solicita un préstamo  para la compra de fertilizantes su cultivo de café y milpa. Su gran anhelo es darles a sus hijos la mejor educación para que tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Pedro is a father to his family, and he is 36 years old. He is married and has great aspirations for his life. He has a beautiful family, and he has seven children between the ages of 3 and 15. They live in a neighborhood in caserío chitzanchaj.

Pedro (on the far left side in the photo) is one of the many great men who work everyday under the radiant sun, in order to provide food for his family. He has made a living in agriculture for 20 years growing a variety of vegetables in the area where he lives. In addition to growing, he also sells vegetables.

Pedro is a very friendly and caring man who is joining up with a group of other people who have the same need as he does. He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for his coffee and corn crops. His greatest desire is to give his children a better education so that they have a better future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow coffee and bananas.

loans.name: Jose Julian

texts.es: José de 27 años de edad, es un hombre quien se dedica a laborar en una empresa que se encuentra cerca de su comunidad. Actividad que le ha permitido mantener la economía de su hogar luego de la pérdida de sus padres. Día con día se esfuerza por salir adelante a pesar de estar solo. Sin perder la visión de poder mejorar su condición de vida solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: arena, cemento, ladrillos y pago de mano de obra para reparar una pared de su vivienda ya que con el paso del tiempo se ha deteriorado y existe el miedo que una desgracia pueda ocurrir. Es por ello que solicita esta ayuda para poder mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old and works in a business near his community. This occupation has allowed him to maintain his household finances after the loss of his parents. Day after day, he makes the effort to get ahead despite being alone. 

Without losing sight of being able to improve his standard of living, he requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in sand, cement, bricks, and to pay manual labor to repair a wall in his house, which with the passing of time has deteriorated. He fears a misfortune may occur. For this reason, he requests help to be able to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to invest in sand, cement, bricks, and to pay manual labor to repair a wall in his house.

loans.name: San Antonio De Ancahuanchana Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN ANTONIO DE ANCAHUACHANA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Sonia tiene 40 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de cultivo de frutas como platanos, naranjas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios en generala agradecen el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "SAN ANTONIO DE ANCAHUACHANA" communal bank. The bank is located in the province of La Convención, Cusco department.

The member Sonia is 40 years old, is in a common-law relationship and has one child. She combines her daily activities with her business of growing fruit such as bananas, oranges and others. She has been in the business for a long time and things are going well for her thanks to the determination she brings to her work each day. She wants to continue to work in this way to continue to support her family.

The member is requesting the loan to buy seeds and manure.

The members as a group are grateful for the loan awarded them and promise to comply with the established payments. The person with their face whited out does not belong to the communal bank.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Ake

texts.en:
Ake is a 49 year old mother with 6 children. She runs a small business of selling taro and bananas in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 3 years.

Ake has requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tube (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, a water tank, and work gloves to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business and provide for her family's needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tube (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, a water tank, and work gloves.

loans.name: Josel

texts.en:
Josel is 34 years old. She is married with one child who is in school. Josel is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Josel has a spare parts retail business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 29,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of spare parts to resell.

Josel has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of spare parts to re-sell

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 26 years old and has one child. She is married and her child is in school.

Evelyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Evelyn has been raising pigs for 1 year now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Evelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Mutualista Group

texts.es:
Bella es una mujer de 60 años de edad, soltera, tiene 1 hijos mayor de edad, y su negocio es la venta de ropa de segunda mano. 
Ella es amable, paciente y muy responsable. Su negocio lo realiza en el barrio ‘mutualista’ caracterizado por encontrarse al centro de la ciudad, edificios ocupan la mayor parte de las organizaciones públicas y privadas. 
Bella es de tez morena, ojos pardos y cabello corto negro, su lengua materna es el guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español (se encuentra de blusa manga larga blanca con rayas rojas la tercera del lado derecho). Su vida la comparte con su hijo que es mayor de edad e independiente, viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construido de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Debido a su impulso de superación formó una banca de personas con negocios como; panadería, venta de comida, venta de refrescos hervidos típicos, venta de lácteos, artesanía en cuero, confección de mantas y taller de cerrajería, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de ropa de segunda mano de forma ambulante; cada día se dirige a centros comerciales y mercados de la zona, cargada de sacos llenos de su mercadería. Levanta un par de sombrillas y arma un puesto de venta, los peatones del lugar se transforman en clientes y compran sus prendas continuamente, “camino cargada de sacos, al terminar el día los sacos son livianos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que los precios son accesibles a cualquier bolsillo, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para aumentar la mercadería. Su sueño es ampliar su stock de prendas, ella desea comprar ropa de segunda mano por mayor. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que desarrolla esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Bella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa de segunda mano por mayor para aumentar su stock de fin de año.
texts.en:
Bella is a 60 year old single woman who has one adult child. Her business is selling second hand clothing. She is friendly, patient and very responsible. Her business takes place in the ‘Mutualista’ neighborhood which is the center of the city with buildings that house mainly public organizations and private companies.

Bella is dark-skinned, has brown eyes and short black hair. Her native language is Guaraní which she speaks locally and she speaks Spanish. (In the photo she is third from the right wearing a long sleeved white blouse with red stripes). She shares her life with her son who is an adult and independent. They live in a house that is property of the family constructed of bricks and has all the basic services.

Due to her desire to excel she formed a communal bank with people with businesses like: a bakery, selling food, the sale of traditional hot drinks, the sale of dairy products, leather handicrafts, sewing shawls and a metal workshop to request a loan and improve their businesses.

Her business is selling used clothing itinerantly. Every day she heads to the shopping centers and markets carrying bags full of her merchandise. She carries a pair of umbrellas and sets up a stand. The people passing by become customers and constantly buy her clothing. "I walk carrying my bags, and at the end of the day the bags are light", she commented. The advantage of her business is her prices are accessible to every pocketbook, her disadvantage is the lack of money to increase her merchandise. Her dream is to expand her stock of clothing. She wants to buy second hand clothing wholesale. This is her first loan with the institution in the 5 years she has carried out this business.

For these reasons Bella is requesting a loan to buy second hand clothing wholesale to augment her stock for the end of the year.

loans.use: to buy used clothing to augment her stock for the end of the year.

loans.name: Salimatou's Group

texts.fr:
Créer depuis Janvier 2004,  ce groupe est composé de femmes qui ont une expérience dans le programme. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame  Salimatou, (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est  mariée et mère de 03 garçons 02 filles. Elle s’active dans la vente de beignets.

Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 01 sac de farine à 19000f toute les semaines  04 sacs de sucres à 20000f le sac  05 sacs de charbons à 1250f le sac et d’autres condiments pour la préparation de ses beignets qu’elle renouvelle a la fin de son stock
